meanings.sent1: The outcome of the game was a tie.
meanings.sent2: She was happy with the outcome of her hard work.
meanings.sent3: The outcome of the race was a surprise to everyone.
meanings.sent4: The outcome of the experiment was like a light bulb turning on in her mind.
meanings.sent5: The outcome of the negotiation left everyone satisfied.

meanings.definition: The way a thing turns out.
meanings.sent1: The unexpected outcome of the movie shocked the audience.
meanings.sent2: He was curious about the outcome of the meeting.
meanings.sent3: The outcome of the magic trick left everyone scratching their heads.
meanings.sent4: The outcome of the storm was a sky painted in vibrant colors.
meanings.sent5: The outcome of the recipe was a delicious meal that brought smiles to everyone's faces.
